Package com.atakmap.android.contact

Class AvatarFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.contact.AvatarFeature
  • public abstract class AvatarFeature
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an avatar (e.g. profile pic) provided by an ContactConnectorManager.ContactConnectorHandler

      • saveFile

        public java.io.File saveFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Store VCard avatar on file system Currently saves to atak/tmp Re-use existing avatar file if it exists and has same hash

      • openAvatar

                              PointMapItem item,
                              java.lang.String alternateTag)
        Display the avatar in the ATAK image viewer
        Parameters:
        avatar - the avatar feature to display
        item - the point map item to associate
        alternateTag - the alternativeTag in case it cannot be shown.
